name: GraFi Lunar
description:
GraFi Lunar - casual, colorful, minimalist, physical puzzle with traps, treadmills, portals, dragons and changing gravity.
Player goal is to relocate gold coin, using only the change of gravity, on the gold rock and keep for some time to pass the level.

In GraFi Lunar:

- Traps
- Changing gravity
- Cool Soundtrack
- Achievements
- Lunar New Year art
- Treadmills
- Portal's
- Dragons
- 50 levels
